name: Yvan Le Bras Pages
body:
### Welcome on my website.
Here you can follow my scientific carrier as my interests. Some lessons and links are available to help you respectively for learning and make science.

### News
Gen2BIO Saint-Brieuc conference 2016: Animation of a slot dedicated to Citizen science (link towards my [slides](https://cesgo.genouest.org/resources/326) on CeSGO hub)

### Research projects
* 2015-2020 CPER CeSGO project: A INRIA national project with the Brittany region to build the first French e-Science centre in Rennes
* 2012-2015 e-Biogenouest project: A first e-science approach dedicated to Life sciences labs from western France. Financial supports by Brittany and Pays de la Loire Regions through the [Biogenouest](http://www.biogenouest.org/) core facilities network

### Teaching
* 2014-2016:  Bioinformatics Tools, for Licence 2 Life sciences OBI Rennes1 University. [presentation slides](https://cesgo.genouest.org/resources/335) on CeSGO hub
* 2013-2016:  Bioinformatics Introduction, for Master 2 Life sciences EFCE Rennes1 University
* 2012-2014:  R Practical work, for Licence 3 Life sciences Rennes1 University
* 2012-2016:  Member of the [Galaxy Training Network](https://wiki.galaxyproject.org/Teach/GTN) through the Rennes [GenOuest](http://www.genouest.org/) bioinformatics core facility and the [GUGGO](https://cesgo.genouest.org/groups/guggo) Western France Galaxy working Group

### Animation task
*2014-2016: Animation of the [Virtual Research Environment IFB working group](http://www.france-bioinformatique.fr/fr/groupes-de-travail/environnement-virtuel-de-recherche)
*2012-2016: Animation of the [GUGGO](https://cesgo.genouest.org/groups/guggo) Western France Galaxy working Group
*Member of the [MaDICS](http://www.madics.fr/)[ReproVirtuFlow](http://www.madics.fr/actions/actions-en-cours/) working group

### Publication
* Y. Le Bras, O. Collin, C. Monjeaud, V. Lacroix, E. Rivals, C. Lemaître, V. Miele, G. Sacomoto, C. Marchet, B. Cazaux, A. Zine El Aabidine, L. Salmela, S. Alves-Carvalho, A. Andrieux, R. Uricaru, P. Peterlongo (2016) Colib’read on galaxy: a tools suite dedicated to biological information extraction from raw NGS reads. Gigascience. doi: 10.1186/s13742-015-0105-2. [Link](https://gigascience.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s13742-015-0105-2)
* F. Moreews, O. Sallou, H. Ménager, Y. Le Bras, C. Monjeaud, C. Blanchet, O. Collin (2015) BioShaDock: a community driven bioinformatics shared Docker-based tools registry. F1000Research 4 (1443). doi: 10.12688/f1000research.7536.1. [Link](http://f1000research.com/articles/4-1443/v1)
* F. Boyer, C. Mercier, A. Bonin, Y. Le Bras, P. Taberlet, E. Coissac (2015) OBITools: a Unix-inspired software package for DNA metabarcoding. Mol. Ecol. Resour. doi: 10.1111/1755-0998.12428. [Link](http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/1755-0998.12428/abstract)
* T. Darde, O. Sallou, E. Becker, B. Ecrard, C. Monjeaud, Y. Le Bras, B. Jégou, O. Collin, A. Rolland, F. Chalmel (2015) The ReproGenomics Viewer: an integrative cross-species toolbox for the reproductive science community. Nucleic Acids Res. doi: 10.1093/nar/gkv345. [Link](http://nar.oxfordjournals.org/content/early/2015/04/16/nar.gkv345.full)
* A. Bretaudeau, C. Monjeaud, Y. Le Bras, F. Legeai, O. Collin (2015) BioMAJ2Galaxy: automatic update of reference data in Galaxy using BioMAJ. GigaScience 4 (22). doi:10.1186/s13742-015-0063-8. [Link](http://gigascience.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s13742-015-0063-8)
* L. Le Texier, J. Durand, A. Lavault, P. Hulin, O. Collin, Y. Le Bras, M C. Cuturi, E. Chiffoleau (2014) LIMLE, a New Molecule Over-Expressed following Activation, Is Involved in the Stimulatory Properties of Dendritic Cells. PLoS ONE 9(4): e93894. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0093894. [Link](http://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0093894)
* Y. Le Bras, A. Roult, C. Monjeaud, M. Bahin, O. Quénez, C. Heriveau, A. Bretaudeau, O. Sallou, O. Collin (2013) Towards a Life Sciences Virtual Research Environment : an e-Science initiative in Western France. JOBIM 2013. [Link](https://www.e-biogenouest.org/resources/128)
* Y. Le Bras, N. Dechamp, F. Krieg, O. Filangi, R. Guyomard, M. Boussaha, H. Bovenhuis, T. G. Pottinger, P. Prunet, P. Le Roy, E. Quillet (2011) Detection of QTL with effects on osmoregulation capacities in the rainbow trout (Oncorhynchus mykiss). BMC Genetics 12: 46. [Link](http://bmcgenet.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/1471-2156-12-46)
* A. Van Wormhoudt, B. Gaume, Y. Le Bras, V. Roussel, S. Huchette (2011) Two different and functional nuclear rDNA genes in the abalone Haliotis tuberculata: tissue differential expression. Genetica 139 (12) : 1-11. [link](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22210151)
* Y. Le Bras, N. Dechamp, J. Montfort, A. Le Cam, F. Krieg, E. Quillet, P. Prunet, P. Le Roy (2010) Acclimation to seawater in rainbow trout: QTL/eQTL approach for plasmatic ions and gill tissue. Proc. 9th WCGALP. [Link](http://www.wcgalp2010.org/)
* I. Leguen, N. Odjo, Y. Le Bras, B. Luthringer, D. Baron, G. Monod, P. Prunet (2010) Effect of seawater transfer on CYP1A gene expression in Rainbow Trout gills. Comp. Biochem. Physiol. Part A/ 156 : 211-217. [link](http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20167284)
* A. Van Wormhoudt, Y. Le Bras, S. Huchette (2009) Haliotis marmorata from Senegal ; a sister species of Haliotis tuberculata : Morphological and molecular evidence. Biochemical Systematics and Ecology 37 (6) : 747-755. [link](Haliotis marmorata from Senegal ; a sister species of Haliotis tuberculata : Morphological and molecular evidence. Biochemical Systematics and Ecology)
